name: id
description: The element ID of the select.

name: filter
description: The filter function for the select. Defaults to searching by label.
type: (items: any[], search: string, { label }: { label?: string }) => unknown[]

name: disabled
description: Determines if the select is disabled.

name: label
description: The label of the select input.

name: inlineLabel
description: Determines if the label will be displayed next to the select input field.

name: labelHidden
description: Determines if the label is visually hidden. Note that it will still be read by screen readers.

name: contextualHelper
description: The contextual helper for the select. Please refer to the component source for the `ContextualHelper` type definition.

name: optionLabel
description: The label key of the options object.

name: getOptionLabel
description: The getOptionLabel function of the options object. Takes precedence over the `optionLabel` prop.

name: searchable
description: Determines if the options of the select are searchable.

name: clearable
description: Determines if the select is clearable.

name: loading
description: Determines if the select is in a loading state.

name: errorMessage
description: The error message to be displayed below the select.

name: fixMessageLine
description: Determines if the message line should be fixed.

name: descriptionMessage
description: The description message to be displayed below the select.

name: multiple
description: Determines if the select allows multiple selections.

name: readOnly
description: Determines if the select is read-only.

name: positionFixed
description: Determines if the dropdown menu should be fixed to the viewport.

name: requiredMark
description: Determines if a required mark (*) should be displayed next to the label.

name: hasBorder
description: Determines if the select input field has a surrounding border.
